Introduction
This topic contains information on special provision codes, including
definition of special provision codes
data capture of special provision codes
descriptions of individual special provision codes
, and
examples of special provision code 6 indicating computer audit acceptance
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
